name: Oat Bran Tortillas
author: ByMarce
summary: Great for tacos and quesadillas, these tortillas also have added flavor and fiber from oat bran.
directions: In a large bowl, stir together the flour, oat bran, baking powder and salt
Knead the dough on a lightly floured surface for about 5 minutes, then cover and let rest for 10 minutes
Divide the dough into 32 golf ball sized portions, and roll each one into a ball
Flatten each ball using a rolling pin or tortilla press to about 4 inches in diameter and stack them up to keep from drying out
Heat a skillet or griddle over medium heat until hot
Roll out one tortilla at a time until paper thin or as large as your skillet
Cook over medium heat until bubbles form on the top
Turn over and cook on the other side until starting to brown
Stack cooked tortillas while making the others, taking care not to over cook, or you will end up with crackers
